MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH33 postcode area of Musselburgh & Tranent. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am due to faulty overhead line equipment located near to Myles Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:10am on Friday, 20 November 2020
